title: Research idea checklist
toc: true
---

### High-level (at least two for JMP, one for decent paper)

- [ ] New? (literature frontier).
- [ ] Interesting? (Real-world relevance, policy implementation).
- [ ] Data? (New data).

### RQ specification

- [ ] Find concrete real-life example or policy.
- [ ] Check data.
- [ ] Specify trade-off.
- [ ] Specify the setting (agents, outcomes, etc). 
- [ ] Specify potential research design (identification).
- [ ] Specify simple economic model.

### Final checklist

- [ ] Talk to other PhDs.
- [ ] Talk to faculties (2+).
- [ ] Present preliminary ideas.
